title: Step 24

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .two CSS rule should have a background-color property set to rgb(0, 127, 0).

description:
While the red and blue markers look the same, the green one is much lighter than it was before. This is because the green color keyword is actually a darker shade, and is about halfway between black and the maximum value for green.

In the .two CSS rule, set the green value in the rgb function to 127 to lower its intensity.
